name: Touch Traffic HD
description:
Welcome to TRADEGAME Lab game world!
'Touch Traffic HD' is a simple fun and addictive traffic control game on iPhone & iPad. Don't compare with any other traffic control games. It's very different and unique!

There are heavy traffic cities, and their residents are suffering from air pollution and the drivers under a lot of stress.

Can you give them your best solution??
Of course you can do it!!

How to play :

- Enjoy 60 unique stages.
- Touch and drag to change the traffic signal.
- The sum of all car's waiting time is limited.
- Minimize car's waiting time to clear each stage.
- To minimize waiting time, change the signal for a car from another direction as soon as a car has passed the stop line.
- Emergency vehicles should be prioritized. If they are stopped at anytime, the stage will be failed.
- Addictive and dynamic game play.
- Global leader boards via Game Center.

Special items for helping you :

- Increasing 5sec for waiting time limit(30 coins needed)
- Reducing game speed for 20sec(25 coins needed)
- Unlock a stage(10 coins needed)

Tips :

- During the game, your fingers will be very busy so we highly recommend that
you use your two hands to play it.


Enjoy our other management simulation games :

- Cruise Tycoon (Cruise liner management)
- Air Tycoon2 (Airline management)
- Air Tycoon (Airline management)
- Hotel Tycoon (Hotel chain management)
